workflow.name: Generate document summaries & Q&As from PDF/TXT using GPT-4o with Slack alerts
workflow.description:
## üìò Description
This workflow automates document understanding by accepting uploaded PDF or TXT files, extracting their text, generating a structured summary and question‚Äìanswer set using GPT-4o, validating the AI output, and returning a clean JSON response to the requester. It also sends an internal Slack preview and logs malformed outputs for debugging.
It performs intelligent file-type detection, handles binary text extraction, enforces strict JSON formatting from the AI model, and ensures that the final response is clean, structured, and ready for use in downstream systems. All errors‚Äîmissing text, invalid JSON, or malformed AI output‚Äîare captured automatically in Google Sheets.
The workflow is designed as a plug-and-play document-analysis engine that converts any uploaded document into meaningful insights instantly.

## ‚öôÔ∏è What This Workflow Does (Step-by-Step)

üì• Receive Document Upload via Webhook
 Captures incoming files (PDF or TXT) posted to the webhook endpoint.

üîç Check If Uploaded File Is PDF / TXT
 Detects file extension and routes it correctly for extraction:
PDF ‚Üí PDF extractor
TXT ‚Üí text extractor
 Other file types are ignored.

üìù Extract Text from Document
Extracts readable text from PDF binaries
Reads raw plain text from TXT files
The extracted text becomes input for the AI analysis.

ü§ñ Generate Summary & Q&A Using AI
 Uses GPT-4o to produce:
A 150‚Äì200 word summary
Five structured Q&A pairs
 Output must strictly follow the specified JSON schema.

üß† LLM Engine + Memory Context
GPT-4o provides the reasoning engine
Memory buffer maintains short context for stability
Output parser ensures schema compliance

‚ö†Ô∏è Validate AI Output Before Processing
 Checks whether output is non-empty and correctly structured.
 Invalid ‚Üí logged to Google Sheets.

üìä Log Invalid AI Output to Google Sheet
 Records failures for audit, debugging, and retraining.

üßπ Unwrap AI Output Object
 Removes unnecessary array wrappers and normalizes the result.

üì§ Prepare Final Response Payload
 Ensures the workflow responds with a single clean JSON object.

üîÅ Send Final Summary & Q&A Response to Webhook
 Returns the final structured JSON to the requesting system.

üí¨ Send Summary Preview to Slack
 Shares a short preview (first 300 characters) for internal visibility.

## üß© Prerequisites
Webhook endpoint configured for uploads
Azure OpenAI GPT-4o credentials
Google Sheets OAuth connection
Slack bot token

## üí° Key Benefits
 ‚úî Fully automated PDF/TXT understanding
 ‚úî AI-powered summary + structured Q&A
 ‚úî Strict JSON compliance for downstream systems
 ‚úî Error-proof: logs all failures for investigation
 ‚úî Slack visibility for quick internal review
 ‚úî Works with minimal human involvement

## üë• Perfect For
-  Research teams
-  Documentation workflows
-  Customer-support intelligence
-  Interview screening document parsing
-  Internal knowledge extraction systems

workflow.name: Generate Structured Summary & Q&A from Documents Automatically

nodes.name: Check If Uploaded File Is PDF
Check If Uploaded File Is TXT

parameters.text:
=Read the following document text and generate:

1. A clear summary (150‚Äì200 words)
2. 5 important questions about the document
3. Answers for each question

Document Text:
{{ $json["text"] }}{{ $json.data }}

Return the output STRICTLY in this JSON format (no additional text):

{
  "summary": "...",
  "qa": [
    { "q": "Question 1", "a": "Answer 1" },
    { "q": "Question 2", "a": "Answer 2" },
    { "q": "Question 3", "a": "Answer 3" },
    { "q": "Question 4", "a": "Answer 4" },
    { "q": "Question 5", "a": "Answer 5" }
  ]
}

options.systemMessage:
=You are an expert AI document analyst. 
Your job is to read long documents and produce a clean summary and structured Q&A.

Rules:
- Be accurate.
- Be concise.
- Do NOT add any content that is not inside the document.
- Always return the result in JSON format.

nodes.name: Parse AI Summary and Q&A into Structured JSON
Provide LLM Engine for Document Analysis
Store AI Memory for Document Analysis Session
Log Invalid AI Output to Google Sheet
Send Final Summary & Q&A Response to Webhook

parameters.content:
## üìÑGenerate Structured Summary & Q&A from Documents Automatically
This workflow takes uploaded documents (PDF or TXT) and automatically extracts text,
generates a clean summary, produces 5 structured Q&As, validates AI output, and delivers
the final result back to the requester via webhook. A quick preview is also sent to Slack
for internal visibility.

It intelligently handles:
‚Ä¢ Multi-format document intake (PDF + TXT)  
‚Ä¢ Text extraction from uploaded binary files  
‚Ä¢ AI-generated document summary (150‚Äì200 words)  
‚Ä¢ AI-generated 5-question Q&A with accurate answers  
‚Ä¢ Strict JSON parsing + validation to avoid broken responses  
‚Ä¢ Error logging into Google Sheets for debugging  
‚Ä¢ Slack preview messages for rapid review  

This workflow fully automates document understanding and delivers clean, structured,
human-readable insights instantly.

## üì• Document Intake & File Type Validation
Receives uploaded documents and determines whether the file is PDF or TXT.

‚Ä¢ Receive Document Upload via Webhook  
  Captures uploaded binary files and forwards to file-type validation.

‚Ä¢ Check If Uploaded File Is PDF  
  Validates extension and routes PDF files for text extraction.

‚Ä¢ Check If Uploaded File Is TXT  
  Validates extension and routes TXT files for text extraction.

## üìù File Text Extraction
Extracts readable text from uploaded documents.

‚Ä¢ Extract Text from PDF File  
  Converts PDF binary ‚Üí plain text for AI processing.

‚Ä¢ Extract Text from TXT File  
  Reads raw text content directly from TXT files.

## ü§ñ AI Summary + Q&A Generation
Produces structured JSON with summary + 5 question-answer pairs.

‚Ä¢ Provide LLM Engine for Document Analysis  
  Supplies GPT-4o model for summarization and Q&A.

‚Ä¢ Store AI Memory for Document Analysis Session  
  Helps the AI maintain short-term context across retries.

‚Ä¢ Generate Summary & Q&A Using AI  
  Creates:  
  ‚Äì 150‚Äì200 word summary  
  ‚Äì 5 questions + answers  
  Returns output in strict JSON format.

‚Ä¢ Parse AI Summary and Q&A into Structured JSON  
  Converts the LLM output into a strongly typed JSON object.

## ‚ö†Ô∏è AI Output Validation & Error Logging
Ensures the AI returned valid structured JSON before sending to the user.

‚Ä¢ Validate AI Output Before Processing  
  Confirms the "output" object is not empty.

‚Ä¢ Log Invalid AI Output to Google Sheet  
  Stores malformed or empty outputs for debugging.

‚Ä¢ Unwrap AI Output Object  
  Cleans the JSON output so downstream nodes receive a single, clean object.

## üì§ Final Response Delivery & Slack Preview
Prepares the final JSON output and sends it to the requester + Slack.

‚Ä¢ Prepare Final Response Payload  
  Ensures response is a clean JSON object without nested arrays.

‚Ä¢ Send Final Summary & Q&A Response to Webhook  
  Sends the formatted JSON back to the calling system.

‚Ä¢ Send Summary Preview to Slack  
  Sends a short preview snippet (first 300 chars) to Slack for visibility.

main.node: Send Final Summary & Q&A Response to Webhook
Check If Uploaded File Is PDF
Check If Uploaded File Is TXT
Log Invalid AI Output to Google Sheet

data.details:
The IF node can be used to implement binary conditional logic in your workflow. You can set up one-to-many conditions to evaluate each item of data being inputted into the node. That data will either evaluate to TRUE or FALSE and route out of the node accordingly.

This node has multiple types of conditions: Bool, String, Number, and Date & Time.
